question: Taittriya Aranyakas and Taittriya Upanishad are associated to _?
explanation: Each Veda has its own Aranyakas and Upanisads. Aranyakas were mainly meant for ascetics who lived in forest.  Kaushitaki Aranyakas and Aitareya Aranyakas are parts of Rig-Veda. Taittriya Aranyaka and Taittriya Upanisads are parts of Krishna-Yajurveda.
